title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API, packaged as self-contained Docker-like bundles.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy chat, generate, pull, push and embedding calls inside Python scripts.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; provides typed methods for chat, generate, pull, create, delete and listing models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components, enabling retrieval chains, agents and tool use.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models, managing prompts, multi-user auth and RAG file uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs, model management and streaming chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool built in Go that wraps Ollama for prompt chaining, conversation history and markdown rendering in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacements for inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation template combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building semantic search and QA pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub with one-line run commands for x86 & ARM.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama endpoints as REST/GraphQL services with Swagger docs and built-in DTOs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that streams Ollama responses with session memory and model selector widgets.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama providing async chat, generate, pull and list methods with strongly typed models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate offering typed HTTP bindings and an async client for Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarizing notes, generating ideas and Q&A inside your vault.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards user messages to Ollama and streams replies back, supports group whitelist and model switching.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter project showing how to add Ollama chat completions with JWT auth and rate-limit middleware.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with cmdlets like Get-OllamaModel and Invoke-OllamaChat.
